os_id.description: The unique identifier for a facility

country_id.description: The unique identifier for the country of the facility (can be only a country code)

country.description: The country of the facility (can be a country code or name see https://www.iban.com/country-codes)

sector.description: The sector that the facility operates in

product_type.description: The product types that the facility produces

facility_type.description: The type of facility this facility represents

processing_type.description: The type of processing activity that takes place at this facility

number_of_workers.description: The number of workers that are employed at a facility

claim_status.description: Indicates whether a facility has been claimed by an owner or manager

description.description: Description of the facility provided by the claimant

local_language_name.description: Facility name in the language local to where the facility is located, provided by the claimant

website.description: The facilty website, provided by the claimant

minimum_order_quantity.description: Indicates the minimum order quantity accepted by the facility

average_lead_time.description: The minimum time that a facility needs to produce an order

percent_female_workers.description: The percentage of female employees at the facility

affiliations.description: Indicates if the facility is affiliated with any industry initatives

certifications_standards_regulations.description: Indicates if the facility is compliant with any certification, standards, or regulations

contact_name.description: The name for the point of contact (or claimant) for the facility

contact_email.description: The email address for the point of contact

office_name.description: The name of the office associated with the point of contact

office_address.description: The address for the point of contact

office_phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the point of contact
